definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: Since it is very cold at the top, coverall is required.
sentences.chinese: 由於山頂很冷，連身服裝是必須的。

sentences.english: The summit of the mountain is lost in the cloud and mist.
From the mountain peak we commanded a view of three States.
sentences.chinese: 從山頂我們可以眺三個州。

sentences.english: We climbed to the top after an hour.
sentences.chinese: 我們爬了一個多小時纔到達山頂。

sentences.english: It seemed like a long ascent to the top.
sentences.chinese: 登上山頂的路好長好長。

sentences.english: The first peak that we climbed is the "Nazogl", which is the peak slightly left off the middle of this picture.
sentences.chinese: 像片中間稍微偏左的第一個山頂就是納佐格山頂。

sentences.english: The first peak that we climbed is the "Nazogl", which is the peak slightly left off the middle of this picture.
sentences.chinese: 像片中間稍微偏左的第一個山頂就是納佐格山頂。

sentences.english: The old road beside the waterfall place is Jianguo Ridge, leading to Jianguo Village at the hill above.
sentences.chinese: 瀑布羣旁就是建國嶺，通往山頂的建國村。

sentences.english: Appropriately, Maternity Bend follows Hospital Bridge. This too was named after a medical facility – Macau's Maternity Hospital.
sentences.chinese: 山頂醫院天橋之後是產房彎，以澳門的婦產醫院命名。

sentences.english: Out of breath, theys topped at the top of mountain.
sentences.chinese: 他們在山頂停下來時，已是上氣不接下氣。

sentences.english: We linked up with the other group on the hilltop.
sentences.chinese: 我們在山頂和另一個小組匯合。

sentences.english: Peak updraft strength is slightly enhanced with hodograph curvature.
sentences.chinese: 山頂上升氣流強度隨速矢端跡曲率加大而稍有加強。

sentences.english: We struck out at the top of Venusberg.
sentences.chinese: 我們盡最大努力爬上了維納斯山的山頂。

sentences.english: They stood on the top of the mountain, watching the sun rising in the east.
sentences.chinese: 他們站在山頂上，看着太陽正從東方升起。

sentences.english: The stream devolves from the mountains.

definition: flight of steps/(fig.) a means of advancement/stepping stone
